## GpioReport type

An object representing the details of a GPIO alert.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type GpioReport = {
    timestamp: bigint;
    chip: number;
    gpio: number;
    level: GpioLevel;
    flags: number;
};
```
**References:** [GpioLevel](./lgpio.gpiolevel.md)

## Remarks

See [GpioAlert](./lgpio.gpioalert.md)<!-- -->, [gpioSetAlertsFunc()](./lgpio.gpiosetalertsfunc.md) and [gpioSetSamplesFunc()](./lgpio.gpiosetsamplesfunc.md)<!-- -->.
